文献ID: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_027_chunk1
证据片段: Oxide thicknesses were measured by metallography that indicated that oxidation was enhanced by pressure over this temperature range.

文献ID: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_027_chunk1
证据片段: The deleterious effect increased with temperature up to 900°C where the oxide thicknesses were up to five times greater than expected from atmospheric pressure data.

文献ID: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_027_chunk1
证据片段: At 1000°C, the effect was less pronounced than at 900°C, with maximum enhancement factors of around two.

文献ID: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_027_chunk1
证据片段: At 800°C, the enhancement saturated around 15.2 MPa, when further increases in pressure to above normal pressurized water reactor (PWR) operating pressure had no further noticeable effect.

文献ID: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_027_chunk1
证据片段: At temperatures above about 1000°C in unlimited steam, and where the oxide film is adherent, the reaction is believed to be controlled by diffusion of oxygen anions through the anion-deficient zirconia structure

证据片段: Above 1050°C, the kinetics of oxide and oxygen-stabilized alpha layer growth are well described by the parabolic rate laws expected from diffusion theory

文献ID: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_027_chunk6
证据片段: Zircaloy tubing used for nuclear fuel cladding in light water reactors is highly anisotropic due to the hexagonal crystal structure of zirconium at temperatures below approximately 800°C.
工艺步骤: fabrication process using pilgering and intermediate annealing

文献ID: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_027_chunk6
证据片段: During the normal fabrication process using pilgering and intermediate annealing, the crystallographic planes in the majority of grains become oriented so that the majority of the basal poles lie in the radial-circumferential plane of the cladding with the highest density of basal poles oriented at plus and minus 30° to 40° from the radial direction.

文献ID: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_027_chunk6
证据片段: In a boiling water reactor (BWR) fuel assembly, most fuel rods have a hoop stress to axial stress ratio of about 2:1.

文献ID: STP1245-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_10th Volume_027_chunk6
证据片段: For standard Zircaloy-2 cladding that was examined in-reactor, a good correlation with the in-reactor R value was obtained from both tensile and creep tests performed at 382°C.
